title: Ramblings of a Garden Addict
description: "I am a garden addict. A plant collector. A tree-hugger. A worshipper of dirt and lover of rocks." - Sarah MatayNot your average gardening book, author Sarah Matay shares her love of plants and dirt with her readers in this quirky must-read! A collection of all-consuming obsessions, tips, pictures, and musings.Monty Don worship? Check. Giant hostas? Check. Tree-hugging? Most definitely! How-to books may grow old, but reading about another's garden magic never will!
author: Sarah Matay
